name: electricity production, photovoltaic, 570kWp open ground installation, multi-Si | electricity, low voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19948/documentation

This dataset represents the production of grid-connected low voltage electricity with a 570 kWp open ground photovoltaic (PV) plant in Argentina in 2014. Large central photovoltaic power stations in the higher kilowatt to megawatt range can feed directly into the medium- or high voltage grid. However, the voltage depends largely on the design and size of the plant. In order to treat all photovoltaic installations the same way (no matter which size, design and installation type (building integrated or open ground)), low voltage electricity is assumed as a product in this dataset. Please see field 'extrapolations' for further discussion.;The plant consists out of multi-Si panel modules with a total capacity of 570 kWp;An inverter is used to convert the low voltage DC power into AC power. ;An average yield of  1920,565488 kWh/kWp was assumed for the calculations.

From the PV module installed and ready to be used.

This activity ends with low voltage electricity produced with the 570 kWp module, assuming an average yield. 

This dataset includes tap water use for cleaning the module and its treatment.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The annual production volume valid for 2014
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Electricity production with a grid-connected 570 kWp multi-Si photovoltaic open ground installation. See field 'extrapolation' for comment on the output voltage.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
The yield output, the net electricity production volume, and the installed capacity have been obtained/calculated from data obtained from CAMMESA. 
Source: CAMMESA "COMPAÑÍA ADMINISTRADORA DEL MERCADO MAYORISTA ELÉCTRICO SOCIEDAD ANÓNIMA" Informe anual 2014. Supporting documentation available at: http://portalweb.cammesa.com/Memnet1/default.aspx

The correction factor, the yield output corrected, the lifetime, the gross electricity production, the panel area for one 3 kWp mSi and the share 570kWp open ground installation, multi-Si, on open ground have been calculated for Argentina.
The parameters "tap water to air" and "process water to air" and the exchange "Energy, solar, converted data" has been taken from the original  dataset
The remaining exchanges have been extrapolated for Argentina from the original dataset "electricity production, photovoltaic, 570kWp open ground installation, multi-Si"/GLO 2008 (accessed: January 26th, 2018).

The simplifying assumption was made that all electricity is directly provided as low voltage electricity, so that no transformation has to take place.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
The information reported in this dataset corresponds to the following PV power plants which represent the total operative units during the reference year:
San JUAN I (2 MW)
CAÑADA HONDA 1 (2 MW)
CAÑADA HONDA 2 (3 MW) 
CHIMBERAS 1 (2 MW)
.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Amount of installation needed to produce 1 kWh * panel area per installation * water need to clean 1 m2 of panel. [unit/kWh * m2/unit * l/m2 = l/kWh]. A density of 1 kg/dm3 is assumed.

exchanges.description: Calculated value based on literature values.
Energy loss in the system is included.
Calculated value. Lifetime*capacity*annual yield = y * kWp/unit * kWh/(kWp*y) = kWh/unit and then the reciproke. Correction factor for yield: 0.92
